abstract.text: Creates and returns a new user interaction object for secure PIN verification using the Smart Card reader facilities.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The Application Protocol Data Unit (APDU) used by the Smart Card to fill in PIN data.
The offset, in bytes, within the Application Protocol Data Unit (APDU) field to mark a location of a PIN block for filling in the entered PIN.
This parameter is not currently used. Pass
A new user interaction object for secure PIN verification, or
if this feature is not supported by the Smart Card reader.
You should only call this method after a session to the Smart Card has been established using the
method, and before the session is terminated using the
Once the interaction has been successfully completed, the results are available via the

abstract.text: Access security tokens and the cryptographic assets they store.
A representation of a smart card.
Begins a session with the Smart Card.
Completes any pending transmissions and ends the session to the Smart Card.
Creates a new user interaction object for secure PIN change using the smart card reader facilities (typically a HW keypad).
Creates and returns a new user interaction object for secure PIN verification using the Smart Card reader facilities.
The formatting properties for a PIN, such as character encoding and length constraints.
The base class for encapsulating user interaction with a Smart Card reader.
A representation of user interaction for secure PIN operations on a Smart Card reader.
The returned data without SW1-SW2 bytes, if any.
A representation of the user interaction for secure PIN change operations on a Smart Card reader.
A representation of the user interaction for secure PIN change verification on a Smart Card reader.
A static byte buffer that bridges to ; use  when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.

inlineContent.text: The Application Protocol Data Unit (APDU) used by the Smart Card to fill in PIN data.
The offset, in bytes, within the Application Protocol Data Unit (APDU) field to mark a location of a PIN block for filling in the entered PIN.
This parameter is not currently used. Pass
A new user interaction object for secure PIN verification, or
if this feature is not supported by the Smart Card reader.

value.text: A static byte buffer in memory.
